testcase.name: Show updates of followed collection
Follow a reader
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Follow a reader Given that there is a reader Andrés ... passed in 0.919s And that there is a reader Juan ... passed in 0.899s When Andrés follows Juan ... passed in 0.001s Then Juan will appear in the list of following of Andrés ... passed in 0.001s And Andrés will appear in the list of followers of Juan ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Show updates of followed reader
Follow a collection of other readers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Follow a collection of other readers Given that there is a collection ... passed in 1.100s When I follow the collection ... passed in 0.232s Then the new collection will appear in my list of followed collections ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
